channel.title: Adding pk points
channel.description:
how do you add pk points. i am using a deltascape base source.
i want it to give 2 pk points per kill, and if you pk someone 2 times in a row you dont get any pk points.
also when you kill someone i want it to yell playername has k0ed playername and now has x-amount of pk points.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2009, 02:26:42 pm[/size][hr]help?
